sentences.sentence: Existing shareholders will have pre-emption rights.
sentences.translation: 现有股东将有优先购买权。

sentences.sentence: The proposal met opposition from shareholders as it ignored pre-emption rights.
sentences.translation: 这一提议忽视了优先购买权，所以遭到了股东的反对。

sentences.sentence: Most institutional shareholders have opposed the plan, mainly because it ignores their pre-emption rights.
sentences.translation: 大部分法人股东宣布反对这一计划，主要是因为该计划忽视了他们的优先购买权。
